name: A Dangerous Mind
description:
You wake up in the middle of a strange aparment, there is almost no lights and you need to escape, but something strange is lurking in the apartment with you.

This game is my project prototype, anything can and will change in the future.

WARNING: There may be bugs.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

F - Light

Esc - Pause Menu, the game doesn't actually pause time.
